org.openimaj.audio

Interface Instrument

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PolyphonicSynthesizer, Synthesizer

    public interface Instrument
    Interface for instruments that can play music.
    Version:
    $Author$, $Revision$, $Date$
    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void noteOff(int noteNumber)
      Turn off the given note.
      void noteOn(int noteNumber, double velocity)
      Play a note on the instrument.

    • Method Detail

      • noteOn

        void noteOn(int noteNumber,
          double velocity)
        Play a note on the instrument.
        Parameters:
        noteNumber - The MIDI note number
        velocity - The velocity (0-1)

      • noteOff

        void noteOff(int noteNumber)
        Turn off the given note.
        Parameters:
        noteNumber - The note to turn off.
